flawed_nl_solution:
In five years, Phoebe will be 10+5 = <<10+5=16>>16 years old.
If Raven is four times as old as Phoebe in fifteen years, he will be 4*16 = <<4*16=64>>64 years old in 5 years.
Currently, Raven is 64-5 = <<64-5=59>>59 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 16. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
